name: Ekokapytal
description:
The game takes place in the year 2084 in a dystopian world where Ekokapytal, the most powerful mega-corporation, is launching a new technology that allows people to digitalize their consciousness. 

You are a hacker who lost his memory through this digitalization process and is now trying to hack into the Ekokapytal servers to retrieve it. Avoid the ads that are hindering your progress but watch out for the ones that give you clues on how to progress in your hacking!  

If you manage to understand and follow their instructions you will be able to unveil the truth about your past!

This is a story driven game with a lot of world-building that we had a lot of fun making! We are a team mainly composed of artists so we tried playing on our strengths. 

We hope you enjoy your time playing! 

Solutions of the puzzles if you just want to discover the world without thinking too much: ekokapytal, myself@meg.corp, room 237, 3069, Jhon Doe, nothing,  ,Retroport, my memory.
